      public void onCancelClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException

    • onSaveClick

      public void onSaveClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the save button is clicked a new product object is created and saved to the list of products. The fields are also checked to ensure there are no errors in the data being added The user is then taken back to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the save button click
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • onPartSearch

      public void onPartSearch(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the user searches for a part it will filter out anything that isnt a match or a partial match
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the searchbar input
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • ifPartSearchIsEmpty

      public void ifPartSearchIsEmpty(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent) throws IOException
      When the form detects no input the table is repopulated with all the data.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - the searchbar being empty
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • onClickProductAdd

      public void onClickProductAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the add button is clicked a part is associated with the product object being created If nothing is selected an error is thrown
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the add button click
      Throws:
      IOException - exception

    • onClickRemoveBtn

      public void onClickRemoveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      When the user clicks remove a part is unassociated with the product object. It also checks to make sure a part is selected and asks for confirmation to remove
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - remove button click
      Throws:
      IOException - exception
